languages.text: "Ну, по крайней мере, в койке она безоружна, а значит — не так опасна. Она ведь там безоружна?"
"Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"
languages.original_text: "Ну, по крайней мере, в койке она безоружна, а значит — не так опасна. Она ведь там безоружна?"

traits.locale_text: "Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"
"Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"
"Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"
"Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"
"Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"

languages.text: "Nun, im Bett ist sie zumindest unbewaffnet und daher nicht ganz so gefährlich. Sie ist doch unbewaffnet, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"

traits.locale_text: "Nun, im Bett ist sie zumindest unbewaffnet und daher nicht ganz so gefährlich. Sie ist doch unbewaffnet, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: « Au moins, au lit, elle est désarmée et un peu moins dangereuse qu'à l'accoutumée. Rassurez-moi... Elle n'emporte pas ses lames dans la chambre à coucher, j'espère ? »
languages.original_text: "Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"

traits.locale_text: « Au moins, au lit, elle est désarmée et un peu moins dangereuse qu'à l'accoutumée. Rassurez-moi... Elle n'emporte pas ses lames dans la chambre à coucher, j'espère ? »

languages.text: «Bueno, por lo menos en la cama está desarmada y no es tan peligrosa. Porque está desarmada, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, por lo menos en la cama está desarmada y no es tan peligrosa. Porque está desarmada, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「少なくともベッドの上の彼女は武器を持っていないから、危険ではないでしょう。武器は持っていない…でしょうね？」
languages.original_text: "Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"

traits.locale_text: 「少なくともベッドの上の彼女は武器を持っていないから、危険ではないでしょう。武器は持っていない…でしょうね？」

languages.text: “不过至少在床上的时候她是手无寸铁的，所以她也没那么危险。她确实是手无寸铁的，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"

traits.locale_text: “不过至少在床上的时候她是手无寸铁的，所以她也没那么危险。她确实是手无寸铁的，是吧？”

languages.original_text: "Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"

languages.text: "Yani en azından uyurken silah taşımıyor ve tehlike teşkil etmiyor. Silah taşımıyor, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Well, at least in bed she's unarmed and so she's not as dangerous. She is unarmed, right?"
